title: How to Contact Olivia Rodrigo by Phone, in Person, or with Fan Mail

steps.title: No, Olivia doesn’t have a public phone number or email address.
steps.content: No, Olivia doesn’t have a public phone number or email address. While you can’t call or email Olivia directly, you can reach out to her managers, Aleen Keshishian and Zack Morgenroth, at Lighthouse Management & Media. Send mail to : [1] X Research source 137 N. Larchmont Blvd. Suite 677 Los Angeles, CA 90004 USA

steps.title: If you call (323) 622-7687, you’ll hear a message from Olivia Rodrigo.
steps.content: If you call (323) 622-7687, you’ll hear a message from Olivia Rodrigo. In 2021, Olivia invited fans to call her Sour Heartbreak Hotline (323-622-7687) during a commercial break for Saturday Night Live . Fans were able to get a “free taste,” or snippets, of the 11 songs from her upcoming album Sour . [2] X Research source The hotline changes when Olivia is about to release new music, so calling the number can result in a preview of her upcoming songs or a message from Olivia. In June 2023, the hotline previewed the first 15 seconds of her new song “Vampire.” When you call the number today, Olivia answers with a short message to visit spillurguts.com. The hotline has changed to the Spill Ur Guts Hotline, named after her second studio album, Guts .

steps.title: Send fan mail to Interscope Records or Lighthouse Management & Media.
steps.content: Send fan mail to Interscope Records or Lighthouse Management & Media. If you want to write Olivia a personal letter or request an autographed photo, address an envelope to her record label or manager's office: [3] X Research source Interscope Records Address: Olivia Rodrigo 2220 Colorado Ave. Santa Monica, CA 90404 USA Lighthouse Management & Media Address: Olivia Rodrigo 137 N. Larchmont Blvd. Suite 677 Los Angeles, CA 90004 USA

steps.title: Be sincere and include a return envelope to get a response.
steps.content: Be sincere and include a return envelope to get a response. Briefly introduce yourself and explain how Olivia has impacted you. Whether she helped you overcome a breakup or inspired you to start singing, get specific about what you love about her. Finish off with a polite request to return your letter, send an autograph , or answer one of your burning questions. [4] X Research source When writing fan mail , use conversational language to showcase your personality. To make your letter stand out (and increase the likelihood of it being read), put it in a brightly-colored envelope or decorate the outside with stamps, stickers, and gems. You could use the album artwork of her debut album, Sour , for inspiration. Be specific to make your letter more meaningful. For example, instead of saying “You're so talented,” you could say, “I admire how vulnerable you are when it comes to songwriting. I listened to “good 4 u” when I was going through a breakup, and it helped me get back on my feet.” If you’re requesting an autograph, send your photo in a properly stamped and self-addressed envelope. It typically takes 3+ months for a response, so try your best to be patient. [5] X Research source In the meantime, you can send fan mail to Billie Eilish , Kelly Clarkson , or another celebrity you admire!

steps.title: Leave a comment or direct message Olivia on her social media accounts.
steps.content: Leave a comment or direct message Olivia on her social media accounts. If you want to get noticed by Olivia, getting her attention online may be your best bet. She may not respond personally, but she may see it and it’s still worth a shot! The only official pages run by Olivia Rodrigo and her team include: Instagram Facebook TikTok X (formerly known as Twitter) Discord WhatsApp

steps.title: Concerts and festivals
steps.content: Concerts and festivals Attending a concert or festival that Olivia is scheduled to perform at is one of the best opportunities to see her in person. Check the tour dates on her website to see if there’s a show near you, or look up popular festivals, like Lollapalooza or Coachella, to see if she’s going to be headlining. Previously, Olivia has performed at the iHeartRadio Music Festival, Austin City Limits, Glastonbury, and Live at the Marquee.

steps.title: Award shows and red carpet events
steps.content: Award shows and red carpet events Search for Olivia’s upcoming appearances on Google to see if she’s attending a movie premiere or music awards show near you. Find out when and where the event will be, and show up early to get a spot near the barricade—if you’re lucky, you might be able to snag an autograph or photo together! In the past, Olivia has attended the Grammys, Governors Awards, BRIT Awards, MTV VMAs, American Music Awards, Met Gala, and Variety’s Hitmakers Brunch.

steps.title: TV show appearances
steps.content: TV show appearances If you want to catch Olivia in real life, look up her upcoming talk show or late-night show appearances, or follow fan-run accounts, like @livieshq and @theolivianews , to stay up to date on her schedule. Tickets are usually released a month in advance for most talk shows, but you might be able to secure standby tickets if you wait outside the studio. Previously, Olivia has appeared on Saturday Night Live , The Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon , The Late Show with Stephen Colbert , Jimmy Kimmel Live! , and The Today Show .
